The scavenging activity of the plant extract against DPPH was determined according to the method described by Otang et al. [ 5]. A solution of 0.135 mM DPPH in methanol was prepared, and 1 mL of this solution was mixed with different concentrations (0.025, 0.05, 0.1, 0.2, and 0.5 mg/mL) of various extracts of A. amatymbica and standard antioxidants (vitamin C and BHT). The reaction mixture was vortexed thoroughly and left in the dark at room temperature for 30 minutes and absorbance measured at 517 nm.
